com.nutiteq.cache
Class TextureMemoryCache

java.lang.Object
  com.nutiteq.cache.TextureMemoryCache

public class TextureMemoryCache
extends java.lang.Object

Texture memory cache for raster map tiles. Cache is organized as fully associative LRU cache.

Constructor Summary
TextureMemoryCache()
           
 
Method Summary
 void add(long tileId, android.graphics.Bitmap bitmap)
          Add raster map tile to the cache.
 void clear()
          Clear the cache.
 void removeRange(long firstTileId, long lastTileId)
          Remove consecutive tile range from the cache.
 void setSize(int maxSizeInBytes)
          Set new cache size limit.
 

Constructor Detail

TextureMemoryCache

public TextureMemoryCache()
Method Detail

setSize

public void setSize(int maxSizeInBytes)
Set new cache size limit. If new size is smaller than existing size, some elements can be evicted.

Parameters:
maxSizeInBytes - new size limit for the cache.

clear

public void clear()
Clear the cache.

add

public void add(long tileId,
                android.graphics.Bitmap bitmap)
Add raster map tile to the cache. Existing tiles can be evicted if cache size limit is exceeded.

Parameters:
tileId - id of the tile to add.
bitmap - bitmap for the tile.

removeRange

public void removeRange(long firstTileId,
                        long lastTileId)
Remove consecutive tile range from the cache.

Parameters:
firstTileId - id of the first tile to remove (inclusive).
lastTileId - id of the last tile to remove (exclusive).
